channel.title: Pacific Crest Trail on BIDS- Environmental
channel.description: Recent content in Pacific Crest Trail on BIDS- Environmental

item.title: Sugar Pine (Pinus lambertiana)
item.description: Another species found! I am attempting to ID all the conifer species that occur in the Miracle Mile while out on runs so I can make a visit to the Miracle Mile and ID all of them in one go. These sugar pine cones are huge! I have a few in my pinecone collection that are greater than 35 cm! Sugar pines (Pinus lambertiana) are fairly common species and I see them on trail runs often.
